hadiths.text: Narrated `Ata' bin Yasar:I asked Zaid bin Thabit about prostration on which he said that he had recited An-Najm before the Prophet, yet he (the Prophet) had not performed a prostration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَرَأَ السَّجْدَةَ وَلَمْ يَسْجُدْ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever recited the verses of prostration and did not prostrate
